text:
Hi all. Is now a good time to talk to the mentors to have a discussion about the projects? How/where do I contact the mentors?
Do I open an issue in github or ping them in this channel or message them directly in slack?

elements.text:
Hi all. Is now a good time to talk to the mentors to have a discussion about the projects? How/where do I contact the mentors?

text: Thanks <@UGR3910CQ> I will DM each of my 3 mentors separately on slack.. I realize my question was a bit too silly.. I apologize! I've heard that DMing the mentors for discussing projects is frowned upon in many other orgs.. but seems like its fine here! Thanks again!
